text: function allocates seats political parties within given electoral district using D'Hondt method, highest averages method proportional representation. party's total vote (total number ballots) divided series divisors (1, 2, 3, ..., number available seats), generating list quotients. Seats allocated one one highest quotients seats distributed. parties surpass specified vote threshold (expressed proportion total votes given electoral district, including blank votes) eligible seat allocation. According Spain's Organic Law General Electoral Regime (LOREG, Article 163.1), tie quotients candidacies, first tie resolved drawing lots, subsequent ties resolved alternately. package, order ensure reproducibility, ties broken ordering highest lowest number absolute votes.
